title: Raúl Martínez (footballer)
text:
Raúl Ascención Martínez Rodríguez (born April 1, 1987) is a Mexican former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who last played for <a href="Murci%C3%A9lagos%20F.C.">Murciélagos</a> in the <a href="Ascenso%20MX">Ascenso MX</a>.
He made his professional debut on July 30, 2005, during a 2–1 win over <a href="CF%20Monterrey">CF Monterrey</a>.
Raul was also capped from Mexico at the U-23 level during the <a href="2007%20Pan%20American%20Games">2007 Pan American Games</a>.
